word: G4092 - πίμπρημι - pímprēmi - pim'-pray-mee - Be swollen

sections.paragraph: ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A reduplicated and prolonged form of a primary word, πρέω preō, (which occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses); to fire, that is, burn (figuratively and passively become inflamed with fever): - be (X should have) swollen.
